name: Condoms By Mad Realities
description:
To celebrate the season finale of Proof of Love S0 of the Mad Realities network, we invite you to mint a condom NFT for your wallet.
  Participate in the finale to unlock a shiny condom by attending the aftershow filming IRL or by voting for the winning couple online.
 Shiny condoms provide secret perks and access to be revealed over time.
  Minting is open for 72 hours after doors open (6:30pm ET on May 1, 2022) and cements your status as an early supporter of Mad Realities.
  https://madrealities.xyz/
